subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Close Hatches beat the 1-5 favorite Dreaming of Julia by seven and one-quarter lengths to win the $300,000 Mother Goose Stakes for 3-year-old fillies at Belmont Park.
snippet: Close Hatches beat the 1-5 favorite Dreaming of Julia by seven and one-quarter lengths to win the $300,000 Mother Goose Stakes for 3-year-old fillies at Belmont Park.
